definition: to force one's way out of encirclement/to break through
total defeat of an army (idiom); fig. a complete wipeout
to annihilate/to wipe out completely/to exterminate
to collaborate/to join forces/to effect a junction
to flee in disorder/defeated and in rout
to encircle and annihilate/refers to repeated campaigns of the Guomindang against the communists from 1930 onwards
